sentences.sentence: He used to make extremely dull, turgid and frankly awful speeches.
sentences.translation: 他过去常作些极其乏味、晦涩难懂且令人生厌的演讲。

sentences.sentence: Frankenstein was already turgid; Percy made it more so.
sentences.translation: 《弗兰肯斯坦》已经是夸张的，但珀西使它更夸张。

sentences.sentence: The rest of the arts scene looks increasingly turgid by comparison.
sentences.translation: 比较而言，艺术界的其他领域看起来越发索然无味。
